July 12, 1954
Harry J. Skomia,
Executive Director,
National Association of

14 Gregory Hall,
Urbana, Ilinois.
Dear Mr. Skomia:
We have received from Miss Martha C#
Howard of the Fund for Adult Education
your gift of Four Years of New York Tele
Vision. 1951-1954.
We are grateful to you for rememberÂ¬
ing us, and shall be glad to add this item
to our collection. Thank you very much.
Sincerely yours,
